text: Colours. Reflect. Time. Loss. is the fourth studio album by English electronic musician Maps. It was released on 10 May 2019 through Mute Records. ==Critical reception== Colours. Reflect. Time. Loss. was met with generally favourable reviews from critics. At Metacritic, which assigns a weighted average rating out of 100 to reviews from mainstream publications, this release received an average score of 80, based on 5 reviews. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! Chart ! Peak position |- |} ==References== Category:2019 albums Category:Maps (band) albums Category:Mute Records albums
title: Colours. Reflect. Time. Loss.
